ComicInfo.Summary: Everything was fine until the joy operation: when one of the city trusts implanted the psyche of one of their en.voi's into master en.voi Joy Corrigan. Now Hampton and Joy live in the same body! They are just getting used to what that means for their life, love, and future when the world decides to blame them for everything that's gone wrong. It's now Joy and Hampton against the world. This is the earth-shattering conclusion to this all-new chapter of this sci-fi extravaganza!
